name: ptcg-standings.live
description: Web app for following pokemon tcg tournament standings'

scriptsComments.dev:frontend: Runs the client in development mode. This doesn't run the server, it only runs the client
scriptsComments.dev:frontend:build: Builds the client in development mode. This doesn't run the server, it only builds the client
scriptsComments.dev: Runs the client and server concurrently. This is mainly for development purposes
scriptsComments.build: Builds the client. This is mainly for production purposes, this is needed so heroku can build the client
scriptsComments.install-client: Installs the client dependencies. This is mainly for Heroku to install the client dependencies after the server has been built
